8. People who are looking for a budget-friendly option to purchase clothing and accessories, crochet hooks can be a cheaper alternative to buying ready-made items.
9. People who are interested in sustainable living and want to reduce their carbon footprint, crochet hooks can be used to create sustainable, handmade items.

11. people who are interested in textile and fiber arts, crochet hooks can be used to create a wide variety of textile-based projects.
12. people who are looking for a creative way to express themselves, crochet hooks can be used as a medium for self-expression.
